Redis Interval Sets.description: A Redis module for creating interval sets

commentDis.description: Add comment syntax to your redis-cli scripts.

redis-rope.description: A native data type for manipulating large strings up to exponentially faster, based on splay trees.

dbx.description: Redis module for maintaining hash by simple SQL

RedisGears.description: Dynamic execution framework for your Redis data.

Session Gate.description: Session management with multiple payloads using cryptographically signed tokens.

Redsmin Proxy.description: Proxy for a fully featured Redis GUI for managing and monitoring Redis.

Webdis.description: A fast HTTP interface for Redis.

redis-cli.description: The default CLI shipped with Redis.

redli.description: A humane alternative to the redis-cli and TLS

iredis.description: Interactive Redis: A Cli for Redis with AutoCompletion and Syntax Highlighting.

RedisInsight.description: Developer GUI for Redis, by Redis.

Medis.description: Medis is a beautiful, easy-to-use Mac database management application for Redis.

redis-browser.description: Cross platform GUI tool for redis that includes support for ReJSON

Redis Commander.description: Redis web management tool written in node.js

p3x-redis-ui.description: 📡 P3X Redis UI that uses Socket.IO, AngularJs Material and IORedis with statistics, console - terminal, tree, dark mode, internationalization, multiple connections, web and desktop by Electron. Works as an app without Node.JS GUI or with the latest Node.Js version. Can test it at https://p3x.redis.patrikx3.com/.

Redis Desktop Manager.description: Cross-platform desktop GUI management tool for Redis
